meanings.definition: A method of teaching reading and spelling based on the sounds of letters.
meanings.sent1: In class, we learn to read using phonics.
meanings.sent2: Teachers often use phonics to help students understand how letters sound.
meanings.sent3: The phonics lesson was so fun, we didn't want it to end!
meanings.sent4: Her understanding of phonics was like a key that unlocked the world of reading.
meanings.sent5: I remember phonics by thinking of it as the music of letters.

meanings.definition: The study of the sounds of the spoken language.
meanings.sent1: Phonics helps us understand how words sound when we speak.
meanings.sent2: Linguists often focus on phonics to analyze speech patterns.
meanings.sent3: The phonics research project turned out to be more interesting than expected.
meanings.sent4: His knowledge of phonics was like having a secret code to understand conversations.
meanings.sent5: The importance of phonics in language study cannot be overstated.
